reasoningText.text:
Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with, then proceed to migrate it from Java 8 to Java 17.

The steps I'll need to take:
1. Explore the repository structure
2. Check the pom.xml file to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17 in pom.xml
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run mvn clean verify to check if everything works
6. Fix any issues that arise

I can see the project is failing to compile because `javax.xml.bind` (JAXB) was removed from Java 11+. Now let me update the project to Java 17. I'll need to:

1. Update the Java version from 1.8 to 17
2. Update all plugin versions to support Java 17
3. Update all dependencies to their latest versions
4. Add JAXB dependencies since they're no longer part of the JDK
